answers.answer: Anything to save $15    If you are young and healthy the mosst likely cause is "orthostatic hypotension". Use Google Search engine and search the term.  If you are older than 40 and have health problems, smoke, have high blood pressure, high cholesterol, diabetes or family history of same or neurologic disease you need to see a MD physician for a complete evaluation.JCH III MD
